documentType: FBI 302 or law enforcement inquiry response
summary: This document is a response from the New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services to an FBI inquiry, providing information about a search of the III (Interstate Identification Index) based on identification data updated in 2016. It indicates that records can be obtained through the III using appropriate NCIC transactions.

persons.name: Michael C. Green
persons.role: Executive Deputy Commissioner of the NYS Division of Criminal Justice Services
persons.context: He is listed as the executive deputy commissioner of the NYS Division of Criminal Justice Services, which is responding to an FBI inquiry.

events.title: Identification Data Update
events.description: The identification data for the subject of the inquiry was updated in the III (Interstate Identification Index).

events.title: FBI Inquiry Response
events.description: The New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services provided a response to an FBI request for a search of the III based on identification data.

locations: Alfred E. Smith Building, 80 South Swan St., Albany, New York 12210
keyFacts: The document is a response from the New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services to an FBI inquiry dated October 6, 2021.
It references a search of the Interstate Identification Index (III) based on identification data updated on October 24, 2016.
The response indicates that records can be obtained through the III using appropriate NCIC (National Crime Information Center) transactions.
Michael C. Green is identified as the Executive Deputy Commissioner of the NYS Division of Criminal Justice Services.
